game.title: The Lost Treasure Quest
game.objective: Uncover the treasure of Captain Blackbeard's hidden island
game.description: Embark on a quest to find the chest of gold coins and gems. Follow the clues provided in the map, locate the Hidden Cave on the eastern side, and retrieve the Skeleton Key to unlock the treasure chamber.

task.objective: Find Skeleton Key at Hidden Cave
task.description: Discover the entrance and obtain the key to unlock the treasure's secrets.
